podcasts.content: Six recent college grads gather once a week to play Dungeons and Dragons 5e as a way to stay in touch and to weave an interesting story. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/artoftheroll/support
podcasts.title: Art of the Roll

podcasts.content: Welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons! Join Dungeon Master Matthew Mercer and an all-star cast of world-class performers each week as they travel through imaginary realms for more adventure than you can shake a magic staff at. Need a deeper dive? Be sure to catch Talks Machina with Brian W. Foster, the official Critical Role companion show, right here on Critical Role.
podcasts.title: Critical Role

podcasts.content: Welcome to the campaign after the campaign! Three unlikely adventurers attempt to right the wrongs caused by a party of legendary heroes who screwed up the world while trying to save it. DM Brian Murphy is joined by Emily Axford, Jake Hurwitz, and Caldwell Tanner for this D&D play podcast.
podcasts.title: Not Another D&D Podcast

podcasts.content: Justin, Travis and Griffin McElroy from My Brother, My Brother and Me have recruited their dad Clint for a campaign of high adventure. Join the McElroys as they find their fortune and slay an unconscionable number of ... you know, kobolds or whatever in ... The Adventure Zone..
podcasts.title: The Adventure Zone
Dragon Talk - An Official Dungeons & Dragons Podcast

podcasts.content: A D&D real play podcast about four dads from our world transported into the Forgotten Realms and their quest to rescue their sons. Not a BDSM podcast!
podcasts.title: Dungeons and Daddies

podcasts.content: In which we sit around a table, pretend to be different people and play some good old fashioned Dungeons and Dragons.
podcasts.title: D&D is For Nerds

podcasts.content: Murder Dice Podcast - 5e, actual play, Dungeons & Dragons podcast with some 2e flair!
podcasts.title: Murder Dice - A 5e Dungeons & Dragons Podcast
